topic.title: Rental Guidelines
topic.shortdesc:
Now that we have added rental services to our business model through AirClassroom, we find that it is important to give guidelines for usage when one of our three products is rented out. We ask that before renting, you read these guidelines carefully, making sure that you adhere to the rules that we have implemented for the safety of the product and the consumer. The products are all located at the front of the classroom, and you will be required to enter your specific 4-digit PIN in order to unlock access to your desired product.
That PIN will be provided to you after purchase through the app.

section.title: Things to keep in mind...
section.p: These are expensive devices and they must be handled with the utmost care. Please adhere to the afformentioned Class Rules Page for any questions on how to behave while using the rented laptops, cameras or iPads.

li.p: DO NOT handle the devices loosely or carelessly. Once your device has been unlocked and is out of the provided protective casing, it is entirely under your care and responsibility.
If the device must leave the classroom, be sure to keep it away from food or drink that could possibly spill and damage the item.
ONLY the renter and students/people under the reservation may use the equipment. No outside persons may handle the equipment without first contacting AirClassroom Support.

Unless requested specifically, the device being rented must be returned at or before the allotted rental time period. Failure to return the device in time will result in a $10 fee for each additional hour of use.
ALWAYS return the device in its provided protective covering.
